titleStmt.title: C. T. Churchill to George W. Johnson
CWG14389

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Elizabethtown May 21st/61
George W Johnson Esqr
Dear Sir
I just arrived from the South yesterday and found a letter hear from you

I am very sorry to say that I made no collections was disappointed in every quarter Just as soon as I can collect I will hand it over to you but am unable to say when it will be I am sorry things have happened so that we could not meet our notes

Yours Very Respectfully
C. T. Churchill
